text: Yeah thats what we do but the struggle is having the content from the production portal to do testing on new module features in all the dev portals. This is a a feature that we wish HubSpot would implement, the ability to clone portals

Just a heads up to the HubSpot devs: I was unable to subscribe to the conversation in both the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Developers/ct-p/developers|developer community> and the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/RevOps-Operations-Hub/ct-p/Operations|OpsHub community> - posting a screenshot of my console for debugging assistance
thanks for the heads up.  will take a look now :slightly_smiling_face:
I have a reported the issue to the dev team. thanks for pointing this out
